content: this is **snowflake no 4 sun star** from the christmas mobile project snowflake **no 3 flower star** https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/flower-star-snowflake-2 snowflake **no 2 frosted lace** https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/frosted-lace-sno snowflake **no 1 winter flower** https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/winter-flower-sn… this pattern is one of 4 from the **christmas snowflakes mobile 2019 ** create beautiful christmas wall hanging in cotton thread this pattern is included in a 6 -page pdf download that includes 2 pages of photos and a chart materials yarn scheepjes sweet treat bonbon 25 g/140 m and drops glitter silver 700 meters 10g hook 1 75 mm or 2 mm depends from your gauge scissors tapestry needle to weave in ends finished size the size of the finished flower depends on the yarn and hook you use **skill level ** upper beginner or intermediate this easy to make textured snowflake can be a great decoration for your christmas tree worked in 6 rounds from the center out note that you have to be **familiar with post stitches**
